resources.string:
Freefall Highscore encourages you to drop you device from high places to achieve the longest duration of free fall. We\'ll record the video and let you submit it to the website featuring the leading drops.
James George - concept and direction, iOS development
Logan Best - web development
Michael Zick Doherty - Android development
Robert Gay - Android development
Helen Mair - graphic design
Maria Mendez - iOS development
Caitlin Morris - exhibition design
Juan Muller - iOS and web development
Developed with support from The Creators Project and Eyebeam Art+Technology Center
Built using open source code by
Stig Brautaset and Hunter and Johnson.

The application developers shall have no liability with respect to the content submitted by the FreefallHS MOBILE APP or any part thereof, including but not limited to errors or omissions contained therein, libel, infringements of rights of publicity, privacy, trademark rights, business interruption, personal injury, damage to property, loss of privacy, moral rights or the disclosure of confidential information.
We reserve the right to remove any submitted content that we deem to be inappropriate or inauthentic use of the application.
